div.style: BORDER-TOP: windowtext 4.5pt solid; BORDER-RIGHT: windowtext 4.5pt solid; BACKGROUND: #bfbfbf; BORDER-BOTTOM: windowtext 4.5pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 1pt; PADDING-TOP: 1pt; PADDING-LEFT: 4pt; BORDER-LEFT: windowtext 4.5pt solid; PADDING-RIGHT: 4pt; mso-element: para-border-div; mso-background-themecolor: background1; mso-background-themeshade: 191

p.style: BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BACKGROUND: #bfbfbf; BORDER-BOTTOM: medium none; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; TEXT-ALIGN: center; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in; mso-background-themecolor: background1; mso-background-themeshade: 191; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext 4.5pt; mso-padding-alt: 1.0pt 4.0pt 1.0pt 4.0pt
